parameter.name: layer
parameter.shortdesc: The layer on which to create the guide. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new Guide &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Guide.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Guide with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Guide with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the Guide with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Guides within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The Guide, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Guide, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The Guide, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Guide, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Guide in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Guide in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Guide in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Guide with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the Guide that follows the desired Guide.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Guide whose index follows the specified Guide in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The Guide whose index comes before the desired Guide.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Guide in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Guide in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Guide.
Returns the Guide with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
